subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. may modify the numbering system that dictates, among other things, that quarterbacks wear jerseys in the single digits or teens, and that the 50's be reserved for linebackers and centers.
snippet: The N.F.L. may modify the numbering system that dictates, among other things, that quarterbacks wear jerseys in the single digits or teens, and that the 50's be reserved for linebackers and centers.
